sentences.en: Below us was a pool surrounded by rocky outcrops.
sentences.cn: 我们的下面是一个岩石围绕的水塘。

sentences.en: Lovers kiss on a rocky outcrop with a view of the Acropolis of Athens.
sentences.cn: 雅典地标图片.情侣亲吻在一处岩石露出以雅典的卫城为目的.

sentences.en: O groundwater recharges the mine through buried outcrop of bedrock laterally.
sentences.cn: 奥灰水通过基岩隐伏露头侧向补给矿井.

sentences.en: Practically every rock outcrop shows numberless joints.
sentences.cn: 实际上所有岩石的露头都显示许许多多的节理.

sentences.en: She sat on a rocky outcrop at the crown of the hill.
sentences.cn: 她坐在山顶一块凸起的石头处.

sentences.en: She was sitting on an outcrop, her slim body supple and salt - caked.
sentences.cn: 她坐在一块突出的岩石上.她的苗条的身材丰满,咸咸的.

sentences.en: The average reflectance of vitrinite of outcrop sandstones is not large difference from core sandstones '.
sentences.cn: 露头砂岩与岩芯砂岩的镜质体反射率无较大差别.

sentences.en: The example from field outcrop in Jiaolai Basin confirms this controlling process.
sentences.cn: 来自胶莱盆地野外露头的实例从另一方面证实了这种控制作用.

sentences.en: The Main Chromitite Seam and the Merensky Reef do not outcrop well.
sentences.cn: 主铬铁岩矿层及麦仑斯基矿层出露不好.

sentences.en: The sedimentology and sequence stratigraphy of bay area have been investigated using the outcrop section data.
sentences.cn: 古土壤蕴含着丰富的基准面及古气候信息,它不仅能为研究古气候变化、建立等时性层序地层格架提供依据,同时亦有助于分析聚煤规律.

trans.tran_en: a rock or group of rocks above the surface of the ground
